title: Встигнути до 30
overview: The plot tells about three girls: Sasha, Ira and Lyuba, whose problems brought them together in one city. It was on this day that all three celebrated their 29th anniversary. The heroines took this as a sign of fate and decided to start a new life, finally saying goodbye to the past. The most important thing: they must have time to change everything before the age of 30.
